attributes.action: allow those on carers allowance free perscriptions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Carers allowance is the lowest paid benefit. It is not even close to the minimum amount that the government say someone can live on per week. So to put less strain on the finances of those who save the nation so much money per year by caring at home for those less able,the government should within 1 month of this petition closing.Make it so, that carers do not have to pay for their perscriptions.
